snippet: With no one seeking to end her run atop the center-right Christian Democrats, Angela Merkel claimed 96.7 percent of the votes cast at a party congress.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel is re-elected as chairwoman of center-right Christian Democratic Union, with 96.7 percent of vote; she ran unchallenged.
lead_paragraph: With no one seeking to end her run atop the center-right Christian Democrats, Angela Merkel claimed 96.7 percent of the votes cast at a party congress.

headline.main: Merkel, Unchallenged, Is Re-elected Leader of Her Party in Germany
